description: This Dart source file defines an AuthService class that simulates user authentication by accepting login credentials, performing validation, and then setting user authentication state with fake tokens.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class that provides an interface for user login, simulating authentication and token management.

methods.name: AuthService
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the AuthService instance.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Asynchronously performs a fake login by validating input and setting authentication state with dummy tokens and user data.
